Ref:: Policy Matter-Technical (135/2013) dated 31.05.2013 Issues relating to authorising ROs for sanction of emergent maintenancelepecial repair works and variation in individual items of contract been  deliberated upon_ Competent Authority has approved a8 follows: I_ Emergent worke relating to repair It has been seen that at times, there could be a stretch where OgM contract may not be in place and there may be an urgency to execute certain itemg of work. It has been decided to authorise ROs to sanction and carry out such emergent works upto a limit of Rs.50 lacs per year ROs may invite short term tender (15 days) if needed in case of emergent works. This authorisation to ROs will be subject to following: There is no O&M contract under operation at the time of invoking this authorisation. (b) The item of work involved is such that in case work is not executed, the gafety on the stretch be impacted. RO will immediately notify the sanction issued by him to CM Division at HQs with full details  IL.
